p: Five different kinds of terpene can be isolated from , they are, the diterpenes, 14,15-dinor-13-oxo-8(17)-labden-19-oic acid and a mixture of labda-8(17),13E-dien-19-carboxy-15-yl oleate, palmitate and triterpene (Popova et al. 2009). Spectroscopic analysis and chemical evidence has been used to establish the structures of the different compounds (Popova et al. 2009). These compounds that were isolated from terpene was tested for its antimicrobial activity against bacteria like gram positive and gram negative (Popova et al. 2009). It was all tested for human pathogenic fungi which has broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity (Popova et al. 2009).
